original_title: 新入社員歓迎会で酔いつぶれた僕が会社の受付嬢に逆お持ち帰りされ朝まで精子搾り抜かれた一夜。
overview: The protagonist gets drunk but receives the unexpected care of the company’s receptionist: Aizawa Minami. A high-caliber woman that doesn’t take a no for an answer.
title: I was drunk at a welcome party for new employees, but the receptionist at the company took me home and squeezed me out until morning
